name: Comfort Zone Electric Oscillating Pedestal Fan, Stand Fan, 16 inch, 3 Speed, 90 Degree Oscillating Head, Adjustable Height and Tilt, Airflow 7.48 ft/sec, Ideal for Home, Bedroom & Office, CZST161BTEBK
short_description: CUSTOMIZABLE AIRFLOW: Enjoy the flexibility of three-speed options with this 16" oscillating pedestal fan. Select from low, medium, or high air speeds to optimize the airflow and create the perfect environment for your comfort. Whether you prefer a gentle breeze or a powerful gust of air, this fan allows you to adjust the speed to suit your needs. Stay cool and refreshed with the versatile airflow options of this pedestal fan. WIDE AIR COVERAGE: Experience enhanced air circulation and efficient performance with the oscillating feature of this pedestal fan. Its wide-angle oscillation ensures that the air is distributed across a broader area, reaching every corner of the room. Enjoy a refreshing and comfortable environment as the fan effectively circulates the air, creating a cool and pleasant atmosphere. FLEXIBLE AIRFLOW DIRECTION: Customize the airflow direction with ease using the adjustable tilt feature of this fan. Simply adjust the angle of the fan head to direct the airflow precisely where you need it, providing targeted and personalized cooling. Whether you want to cool a specific area or create a gentle breeze across the room, the adjustable tilt ensures optimal air circulation exactly where you desire. FLEXIBLE HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT: Customize the height of this oscillating pedestal fan to perfectly suit your space. With its adjustable height feature, you can easily set the fan's height anywhere between 41" and 47-3/8". Whether you want the fan to be at a lower level for a cozy seating area or raised higher for wider air distribution, the adjustable height ensures optimal positioning for efficient and comfortable cooling in any room. SIMPLE AND SAFE OPERATION: This oscillating pedestal fan ensures ease of use and safety at every turn. The fan blades are protected by a sturdy metal safety grill, keeping your fingers and other objects safely away from the rotating blades. With a convenient push button, you can effortlessly adjust the fan speeds or turn it on and off, granting you full control over the cooling experience. Enjoy peace of mind and convenient performance with this user-friendly oscillating pedestal fan.

name: Air King 9723 20-Inch 3-Speed Box Fan , White
short_description: 20-inch, 3-speed fan great for use in any area where space is limited Permanently lubricated 1/25-horsepower motor Impact-resistant grills to protect the blades for long-lasting durability 8-foot, 3-conductor type SPT power cord Comes with a 1-year limited warranty 2140 CFM
product_description: The Air King 20-inch 2,140 CFM 3-speed box fan emits a cool breeze perfect for shops, dormitories, offices, and homes. The 1/25 HP motor keeps the whole room temperate and features low-, medium-, and high-speeds for optimal control. On high speed, the he airflow measures 2140 CFM, on medium it is 1740, and on low it is 1300. As an another feature, the single-phase motor is fully enclosed for long-lasting, quiet performance that is operated by a top-mounted rotary switch. Additionally, this fan boasts maintenance-free permanent lubrication and a permanent split capacitor, as well as two 120-volt outlets to allow the connection of other appliances and tools. Impact-resistant grills protect the blades to ensure long-lasting durability. It comes fully assembled with an 8-foot, 3-conductor, SPT-type black power cord For safety's sake this fan complies with all UL and OSHA regulations. It has 20-inch blades and measures 20-1/2-by-6-3/8-by-23-5/8-inches (LxWxH) and weighs 12.8 pounds.
